thread.title: YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red
thread.title_full: YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red

author: RYAN NAKASHIMA
title: YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red
text:
Danny Moloshok YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red 
Robert Kyncl, YouTube Chief Business Officer, speaks as YouTube unveils "YouTube Red," a new subscription service, at YouTube Space LA Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. The service combines ad-free videos, new original series and movies from top YouTubers like PewDiePie, and on-demand unlimited streaming music for $10 a month. (AP Photo/Danny Moloshok) Danny Moloshok YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red 
Robert Kyncl, YouTube Chief Business Officer, speaks as YouTube unveils "YouTube Red," a new subscription service, at YouTube Space LA offices Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Danny Moloshok) Danny Moloshok YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red 
Robert Kyncl, YouTube Chief Business Officer, speaks as YouTube unveils "YouTube Red," a new subscription service including original programming, at YouTube Space LA offices Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. The service combines ad-free videos, new original series and movies from top YouTubers like PewDiePie, and on-demand unlimited streaming music for $10 a month. (AP Photo/Danny Moloshok) Danny Moloshok YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red 
Robert Kyncl, YouTube Chief Business Officer, speaks as YouTube unveils "YouTube Red," a new subscription service, at YouTube Space LA offices Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. The service combines ad-free videos, new original series and movies from top YouTubers like PewDiePie, and on-demand unlimited streaming music for $10 a month. (AP Photo/Danny Moloshok) Danny Moloshok YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red 
Robert Kyncl, YouTube Chief Business Officer, speaks about music as YouTube unveils "YouTube Red," a new subscription service, at YouTube Space LA offices Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. The service combines ad-free videos, new original series and movies from top YouTubers like PewDiePie, and on-demand unlimited streaming music for $10 a month. (AP Photo/Danny Moloshok) Posted: Wednesday, October 21, 2015 9:04 pm | Updated: 12:00 am, Thu Oct 22, 2015. YouTube to launch $10-a-month ad-free video, music plan Red Associated Press | 0 comments 
LOS ANGELES (AP) — YouTube on Wednesday unveiled a new $10-a-month subscription plan in the U.S. called Red that combines ad-free videos, new original series and movies from top YouTubers, and on-demand unlimited streaming music. 
Red builds on Google's existing music streaming service by providing ad-free access to YouTube programming, along with features such as the ability to download videos to mobile devices and have music playing in the background while using other mobile apps. kAmrFCC6?E DF3D4C:36CD E@ E96 v@@8=6 !=2J |FD:4 D6CG:46[ H9:49 2=D@ 4@DED S`_ 2 >@?E9[ H:== 2=D@ 86E 2446DD E@ #65]k^Am kAmQxEVD 2 >2;@C[ >2;@C 6G@=FE:@? @7 @FC A=2E7@C>[Q *@F%F36VD 49:67 3FD:?6DD @77:46C[ #@36CE zJ?4=[ E@=5 ;@FC?2=:DED 2E 2? 6G6?E 2E :ED DEF5:@ DA246 :? {@D p?86=6D]k^Am kAm#65 E2C86ED *@F%F36 72?D H9@ H2?E E@ D<:A 25D[ H9:=6 8:G:?8 E96> 2 492?46 E@ A2DD 2=@?8 D@>6 42D9 E@ E96:C 72G@C:E6 G:56@ 4C62E@CD[ H9@V== D92C6 :?
